name: Radge! Bar fight
description:
Try to set things out of control by picking fights on a bar, the more you level, the harder.

It's a retro styled arcade game with basic mechanics made in 24 hours for Jams.

Any feedback is well recieved.

To play use arrow keys to move and space bar to punch

To start a new game pick CREDIT to insert COINS

If game is not running please try windows build.
